### Sample preparation
Sample preparation was performed by each participant according to how they usually disrupt tissues.

Herring tissue was disrupted in a mortar and pestle on wet ice with addition of liquid nitrogen.

[Sample preparation: Herring](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RMHJ6ZeyUOB9U1tt1SUSLXNLePQ9kK6q/view?usp=share_link)

Reindeer heart tissue was disrupted in a mortar and pestle laying in liquid nitrogen. 

[Sample preparation: Reindeer heart](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RMHJ6ZeyUOB9U1tt1SUSLXNLePQ9kK6q/view?usp=share_link)
